means: 为…供给资金，从事金融活动( finance的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Fix your attention on the practicalities of financing your schemes.
sentence.Network_cn: 重点考虑为你的计划融资是否可行。

sentence.Network_en: They are accused of organising and financing an underground youth movement.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们被指控组织并资助地下青年运动。

sentence.Network_en: The financing of home ownership will continue through the 1990s and beyond.
sentence.Network_cn: 购房贷款政策将会延续到20世纪90年代及以后。

entry.def: When someone finances something such as a project or a purchase, they provide the money that is needed to pay for them.

example.ex: The fund has been used largely to finance the construction of federal prisons...
example.tran: 该基金大部分用于了资助联邦监狱的建造。

example.ex: Government expenditure is financed by taxation and by borrowing.
example.tran: 政府开支依靠征税款和借贷来维持。

entry.def: Finance is the commercial or government activity of managing money, debt, credit, and investment.

example.ex: ...a major player in the world of high finance...
The report recommends an overhaul of public finances...
example.tran: 该报告建议对公共财政进行彻底改革。

entry.def: You can refer to the amount of money that you have and how well it is organized as your finances .

example.ex: Be prepared for unexpected news concerning your finances...
example.tran: 对财务上的意外状况要做到有备无患。

example.ex: In general, women manage the day-to-day finances but leave most longer-term decisions to men...
example.tran: 通常，妇女管理日常财务，而把大多数较长期的决策交给男人。
